title: Angular Js ng-repeat iterating over JSON
body:
Please read documentation ngRepeat

todos should be an array or an array of objects(in your case) like this 

$scope.todos = [{
        title: "task 1",
        cat: "category 1",
    },{
        title: "task 2",
        cat: "category 2",
    },{
        title: "task 3",
        cat: "category 3",
    }  ]

ngrepeat will iterate over the array so inside ngrepeat you will be getting each todo

<li ngrepeat ='todo in todos'>{{todo.title}}</Li>

rendered output would be somthing like this

  • task1
  • task2
  • task3
